item.description: About me I hold a Ph.D. in Finance from Université Paris-Dauphine, and I am currently visiting Imperial College Business School. I will be attending the ASSA meetings in Atlanta over January 4-6, 2019.

item.title: Experience
item.description: Visiting Researcher, 2018-2019 Imperial College Business School Temporary Lecturer (ATER), 2016-2018 Université Paris Dauphine Research Intern, 2011 (5 months) Laboratoire de Recherche en Informatique (LRI), Paris Software Designer (Summer intern), 2010 IP Partners, Tokyo

item.title: Teaching
